extends Card

        weaponID - is a unique ID that identifies the weapon
        isLoaded - is a boolen to indicate if the weapon is loaded
        Throws:

      • useWeapon

        public abstract void useWeapon(ResponseInput responseMessage)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method takes a response message specified for a weapon and it reads the inputs and after it uses it to use this weapon during the match The response message travels from client to Server and the controller give it to the CardWeapon
        Parameters:
        responseMessage - response message specified for the weapon
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there are errors in the response message

      • checkAvailableMode

        public abstract boolean[] checkAvailableMode()
        Check which modes of the weapon can be used by player that has this weapon
        Returns:
        array of booleans , represents which modes can be used by player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this card doesn't belong at a player

      • getRequestMessage

        public abstract RequestInput getRequestMessage()
        Get a message of request for this weapon The content of the message depends if the modes of this weapon can be used by the player that has got it
        Returns:
        Message of request to send at client
